Posts.Content: Thanks for your comments and good wishes. Hope you are well too.Â
Posts.Title: Metal taste in the mouth.

Posts.Content: Hi, I've just joined this site, although i have just had my 5th chemo. I'm having Docitaxel for the last 3 of 6. With this round i have the worst taste in my mouth imaginable, and stomach ache after i eat, followed by a trip to the loo. Not every meal, mornings seem the worst. It's a week since my chemo and this taste is getting unbearable, i can't taste anything i eat. Anyone had the same?
Posts.Title: Metal taste in the mouth.
